name: Monterey Jerk Dog
author: Ball Park Buns
summary: Give your next barbecue some island flavor with this Caribbean-influenced recipe, which perfectly balances the spiciness of jerk seasoning with the sweetness of caramelized onions and pineapple.
ingredients: 6  Ball Park® Original Hot Dog Buns
directions: Whisk garlic powder into mayonnaise and spread onto Ball Park® Hot Dog Buns
Coat the bottom of a small skillet with olive oil and warm on medium heat
Add the onion and caramelize by stirring until golden brown
Add jerk seasoning and remove from heat
Butterfly the hot dogs by splitting on one side, leaving the other side intact, then grill split-side down until grill marks appear (safe internal temp
Flip hot dogs and add the jerk onions and cheese into each split
Open each bun and lightly toast opening-side down
Place each hot dog into a toasted bun and add pineapple or your favorite toppings
